data_coverage.local_content_requirements: Limited data - Morocco has explicit 30% requirement

notes: Many countries are transitioning from feed-in tariffs to competitive auction systems
Carbon pricing mechanisms are predominantly voluntary carbon markets in developing countries
Local content requirements are not universally implemented or publicly documented
Tariff rates have generally declined over time due to technology cost reductions
Several countries have legally binding targets (Chile, Australia)
Grid connection and land allocation policies vary significantly by country
metadata.data_quality: Official government sources, international organizations (IEA, IRENA, World Bank), and verified trade authorities
metadata.currency_notes: All monetary values converted to USD where possible; original currency included where relevant
